            // Calcs Total Cost of Premium PR &amp;&amp; Toggles 'Free Press Release' (i.e. Create) and Paypal buttons
            function getTotalCost() {
                sTotalCost = 0;
                if (document.getElementById('cbImg') != null &amp;&amp; document.getElementById('cbImg').checked == true) {
                    document.getElementById('amount_1').value = 10;
                    sTotalCost = sTotalCost + 10;
                }
                else {
                    document.getElementById('amount_1').value = 0;
                }
                if (document.getElementById('cbLinks') != null &amp;&amp; document.getElementById('cbLinks').checked == true) {
                    document.getElementById('amount_2').value = 10;
                    sTotalCost = sTotalCost + 10;
                }
                else {
                    document.getElementById('amount_2').value = 0;
                }
                if (document.getElementById('cbFPR') != null &amp;&amp; document.getElementById('cbFPR').checked == true) {     //tbFPRCost
                    sTotalCost = sTotalCost + Number(document.getElementById('tbFPRCost').value);
                    document.getElementById('amount_3').value = Number(document.getElementById('tbFPRCost').value);
                }
                else {
                    document.getElementById('amount_3').value = 0;
                }
                if (sTotalCost &gt; 0) {
                    document.getElementById('lblTotalCost').innerHTML = 'Total Cost: ' + formatNumber(sTotalCost.toString(), '$') + '&nbsp;&nbsp;';
                    document.getElementById('cphMain_btnFreePR').style.visibility = "hidden";
                    document.getElementById('cphMain_btnPayPal').style.visibility = "visible";

                    document.getElementById('cphMain_btnPayPal').style.visibility = "hidden";

            // Converts $ to impressions
            function getNumImpressions(objThis, strThatID) {
                var spend = objThis.value;
                var numImps = spend * 1000; 
                
                if (spend &gt;= 100) {
                    numImps = numImps * 3;
                }
                
                strVal = formatNumber(numImps, '');
                document.getElementById(strThatID).innerHTML = strVal;
                getTotalCost();
                return true;
            }

            // Formats numbers by adding commas (and prefix could be '$')
            function formatNumber(nStr, prefix) {
                var prefix = prefix || '';
                nStr += '';
                x = nStr.split('.');
                x1 = x[0];
                x2 = x.length &gt; 1 ? '.' + x[1] : '';
                var rgx = /(\d+)(\d{3})/;
                while (rgx.test(x1))
                    x1 = x1.replace(rgx, '$1' + ',' + '$2');
                return prefix + x1 + x2;
            }
            
            // Following 3 functions used to display field limits

               <span class="Header1Large" id="cphMain_Label_Title">
                Detector Inspector offers Carbon Monoxide Gas Services
               </span>
               <br/>
               <span class="ContentSmallGrey" id="cphMain_Label_Summary">
                Equipped with the Latest Carbon Monoxide Gas Testing Equipment, Detector Inspector Keeps you Safe from Fire and Gas.
               </span>
               <br/>
               <br/>
               <div id="cphMain_Panel_Button" style="width:100%;">
                <!-- Google Link Ad -->
                <div style="display:block; float:left; margin: 0px 10px 0px 0px;">
                 <script type="text/javascript">
                  &lt;!--
    google_ad_client = "pub-8092680313473946";
    /* BW04_200x200_20100602 */
    google_ad_slot = "0631317674";
    google_ad_width = 200;
    google_ad_height = 200;
    //--&gt;
                 </script>
                 <script src="http://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/show_ads.js" type="text/javascript">
                 </script>
                </div>
                <!-- END Google Link Ad -->
               </div>
               <!-- Google Button or Premium Img -->
               <span class="ContentSmall" id="cphMain_Label_Body1">
                <i>
                 <a href="http://www.BriefingWire.com">
                  BriefingWire.com
                 </a>
                 , 10/27/2014 -
                </i>
               </span>
               <span class="ContentSmallGrey" id="cphMain_Label_Body2">
               </span>
               <span class="ContentSmall" id="cphMain_Label_Body3">
                Victoria, Australia, October 2014  The team at Detector Inspector recently revealed that they now offer carbon monoxide gas services to their customers alongside their annual smoke detector maintenance service. Tenant safety has been and will always be our number one concern, said Jason Radolnik, Director at Detector Inspector. This new service is another step in making sure that tenants live in a safe and secure environment and that landlords and agents meet their legislative obligations. The company believes the most crucial part of this service roll out is in hiring experienced, qualified and licensed gas plumbers who are authorized by the Plumbing Industry Commission (PIC). These professionals are well equipped with the latest testing equipment and have specialist knowledge, which means clients can rest assured that their property is secure and protected.
                <p>
                 Carbon monoxide is a highly dangerous and potentially deadly gas. Known as the silent killer it is colourless and odourless, making it practically impossible to detect without specialised tools. According to data released by Energy Safe Victoria (ESV) a total of 9 people have been loss there life by this deadly gas in the past decade alone. Carbon monoxide gas enters ones body via the respiratory tract and slowly hampers the operation of the bodys internal organs, which is why it is also known as a slow poison. The gas is produced as a result of incomplete combustion of fossil fuels, which in turn is caused by faulty gas appliances.
                </p>
                <p>
                </p>
                <p>
                 Jordan Kagan Gesheit, Director at Detector Inspector explains that too many people fall victim to incidents of home fires and carbon monoxide gas because they are simply not aware of the precautions available to them, like smoke and carbon monoxide detectors at home, adding that professional smoke alarm maintenance and carbon monoxide gas testing really could save your life. Detector Inspector utilise their social channels to alert people to instances of fire and poisoning which could have been avoided, as well as highlighting situations where detectors proved life-saving. They stress the benefits having working alarms in place as well as the importance of regular carbon monoxide and smoke detector testing. The only way of preventing or avoiding fatalities in advance of an unexpected event, is making more and more people aware of why it is important to install detector systems at residential and commercial premises.
                </p>
                <p>
                </p>
                <p>
                 About Detector Inspector
                </p>
                <p>
                </p>
                <p>
                 Detector Inspector is an Australian provider of professional smoke alarm maintenance, specialising in smoke alarm services and solutions. Detector Inspectors commitment is to provide a professional, hassle free smoke alarm service. The list of services offered includes smoke detector and carbon monoxide detector servicing, testing, maintenance and electrical servicing. Their services are structured with the occupants safety as the number one goal, while protecting managing agents and landlords from potential litigation.
                </p>
               </span>

               <br/>
